headline: Robotic Combat Vehicles Market Trends, Competitive Strategies and Forecasts Report 2025-2033 | Demand Soars for Modular, Scalable Robotic Combat Platforms in Military Operations
summary: The robotic combat vehicles market is set to grow at a 7% CAGR from 2025 to 2033, propelled by military modernization and defense automation. headline: GD Q2 Deep Dive: Backlog Growth and Defense Demand Drive Strong Quarter
summary: Aerospace and defense company General Dynamics (NYSE:GD) reported Q2 CY2025 results exceeding the market’s revenue expectations, with sales up 8.9% year on year to $13.04 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $3.74 per share was 5.6% above analysts’ consensus estimates.
